name: Dinner (Autumn Rain, Eugene Valentine)
description:
A game made in like a week for Scorpy's Spooky Scary Jam or Whatever IDK by AUTUMN RAIN and EUGENE VALENTINE.

This is a short point-and-click adventure. You must look around the kitchen and click on things and things will happen. You have a very special dinner to make for Scorb and Pol Martin and a special guest. Can you do it? Maybe something scary will happen....

Playtime ~5 Minutes.
